text: Inuwa Kashifu Abdullahi (born 21 February 1980) is a Nigerian Technology expert and the Director General of the National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA).FG Appoints Mr Kashifu Abdullahi as Director- General NITDA, Vanguard Nigeria Abdullahi graduated with Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science from Abubakar Tafawa Balewa University Bauchi State, Nigeria and was Massachusetts Institute of Technology trained as MIT Sloan strategist and has over fourteen years of working experience in Information Technology operations, business transformation and solution architecture, across both private and public sectors. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian Muslims Category:Abubakar Tafawa Balewa University alumni
title: Inuwa Kashifu Abdullahi
